definition: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, movie by Ang Lee 李安[Li3 An1]
lit. hidden dragon, crouching tiger (idiom)/fig. talented individuals in hiding/concealed talent
to lie/to crouch
tiger/CL:隻|只[zhi1]
Tibet/Xizang 西藏
storehouse/depository/Buddhist or Taoist scripture
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long

sentences.english: Another testimony that in Jianghu, everyone has an evil heart, and everywhere there are crouching tigers and hidden dragons.
sentences.chinese: 再一次證實了江湖上人心險惡，處處臥虎藏龍。

sentences.english: The film "Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon" is on at the cinema.
sentences.chinese: 電影院正在放《臥虎藏龍》這部電影。

sentences.english: Ang Lee’s Crouching Tiger had kind of done so.
sentences.chinese: 但是李安的《臥虎藏龍》在某些方面已經做到了。

sentences.english: You may not know but TTC is also a place where there are crouching tigers and hidden dragons.
sentences.chinese: 大家也許有所不知三一是一個臥虎藏龍的地方。

sentences.english: In Crouching Tiger, that motion has its own poetry.
sentences.chinese: 在《臥虎藏龍》中，這場打鬥充滿詩情畫意。

sentences.english: The filem "Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon" created a sensation in the world.
sentences.chinese: 《臥虎藏龍》這部電影在世界上引起轟動。

sentences.english: Folk art is really clearing up, Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon.
sentences.chinese: 民間藝術真是高手如雲，臥虎藏龍。

definition: golden branch, jade leaves (idiom); fig. blue-blooded nobility, esp. imperial kinsmen or peerless beauty
film and theater/screen and stage
to win instant success (idiom)/to become an instant hit
Maggie Cheung (1964-), Hong Kong actress
Chow Yun-Fat (1955-), Hong Kong TV and film star
to write and direct (a play, film etc)/playwright-director/choreographer-director/scenarist-director
Chen Kaige (1952-), Chinese movie director
Zhang Yimou (1950-), PRC film director
Danny Lee Sau-Yin (1953-), Hong Kong actor and director
venturing from one's thatched hut for the first time (idiom)/young and inexperienced/novice/greenhorn
to make a movie
Lau Ching-Wan (1964-), Hong Kong actor
to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
to reveal outstanding talent (idiom); to stand out as conspicuously brilliant
theater chain (abbr. for 電影院線|电影院线)
Tale of the White Snake/Madame White Snake
